answers.answer: I know how you feel ..... every time I go to the dr they tell me that I'm slightly dehydrated and I've been sick since I was 6 weeks so I can relate to you as well .... Hopefully tomorrow will be different for me since we're finding out what we're having .... I hope everything works out for you in the end ..... Good luck!

Third tri has been a nightmare for me.~spd~varicose vein in hoohaa~abcsess on the varicose vein~urine infection~had to be put on iron pills~ i had the worry of gestational diabetes but itturned out i was just really dehydrated.~now im measuring big so have to have a scan tomoz to see if everything is ok...Every trip to see the midwife is like hmm i wonder whats rong this week... Ive got 23 days left... excited and scared... :/

Yeah, the nurse was like well I know you get bad news everytime you're here but I have some more ...ugh, I've only gained a pound and a half since before Christmas though, I've lost body weight and its going all to baby so I guess that's good at least

Thats the same way I felt for along time, but not every pregnancy is the same i convinced myself of that lol. Plus I have to have my boy before I quit lol. Hope you feel better some things are out of our control. Have you tried preggy pops they sell the at babys r us and when I was sick i would eat pickles, and watermelon with a little lemon. Lol not at the same time of course just whichever i felt like at the moment and it helped.

Since december 1st I have had 2 hemorrhages, and twice went to ER for heavy red bleeding,  I have complete placenta previa and have been on bed rest since 12/1/12 and will be the rest of the time because im still bleeding (lightly)...I still have 4 months to go! I wish I could enjoy being pregnant like everyone else :(
Stay positive ; God will not put you in any perdicament you can't handle !

I was told today by a high risk doctor that I do not have previa,  they were wrong in the ER and that I have a separation in the placenta from the uterus with lots of blood in between.  Still on bed rest but more worried now :(  I am a ftm and all this bleeding is extremely scary!

question: I feel like I can't catch a break here...I had another Dr appt today and I had high sugar in my pee so they think I have gestational diabetes :( I go for more tests tmrw...my last appt I had BV and had tobe on antibiotics, and I've had morning sickness, since day one...sigh..I feel like I am just not meant to be pregnant and this will be my first and last child.
title: bad news at EVERY doctor appt :(
